item.title: [EU][Control panel & API] - Internal databases version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 05:00 - 07:00 UTC

Feb 19, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Control panel & API offer.

This may temporarily affect functionality.

Start time : 14/03/2024 05:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2024 07:00 UTC
Service impact : A few second of downtime
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our databases, we are doing a version upgrade on MySQL.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - E-mails not being sent
item.description:
Mar 10, 21:04 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 10/03/2024 12:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2024 20:45 UTC
Service impact : Customers weren't receiving an e-mail when trying to create a new account or trying to re-install an operating system on their server
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 10, 14:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/03/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers aren't receiving an e-mail when trying to create a new account and trying to re-install an operating system on their server
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: Closing deprecated Manager V4 for VoIP clients
item.description:
Feb 15, 13:45 UTC
Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items.

Feb 14, 17:59 UTC
Scheduled - Dear customer,

As part of our policy of continuous improvement and with the aim of offering you the best solutions in sovereign and secure environments, our teams recently migrated the last lines using Easy PABX and Mini PABX to our CCS solution (Contact Center Solution).

This means that the entire telephony functional scope is now available on the V6 manager.

As a result, we have scheduled the closure of Manager V4 for VoIP customers for Thursday 15 February 2024 at 13:00 UTC.

You can find guides to help you use your services on Manager V6 on the following page : Phone and Fax - OVHcloud

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Customer Service] - Ordering domain through api without authentification
item.description:
Feb 14, 16:06 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 7, 13:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 2, 23:22 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/02/2024 13:00 UTC
End time : 19/02/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : `{eu,ca}.api.ovh.com/1.0/order/cart/{cartId}/domain` will require authentification
We are going to enforce authentification gradually, making it mandatory few hours per day following this schedule until the final deadline:

- from 01:00 PM to 02:00 PM UTC February 7th

- from 01:00 PM to 03:00 PM UTC February 12th

- from 08:00 AM to 04:00 PM UTC February 14th

- from 06:00 AM to 22:00 PM UTC February 15th
Permanently starting February 19th

After February 19th, this API route will permanently require to be authenticated.

item.title: [Global][Support] - Help Centre portal
item.description:
Dec 8, 06:56 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 8, 03:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 7, 16:41 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/12/2023 03:00 UTC
End time : 08/12/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Punctual slownesses of the application
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will deploy new features on the instance.
Workaround : Help Center will remain accessible https://help.ovhcloud.com along with the Manager https://www.ovh.com/manager.
If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.
You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md .

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - api.ovh.com EoL Deprecated Routes
item.description:
Nov 13, 10:27 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 13, 09:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 30, 10:22 UTC
Scheduled - Time : 13/11/2023 09:30 UTC
Maintenance : Deletion of deprecated API routes
Impacted routes: 

GET /domain/{serviceName}/owo
GET /domain/{serviceName}/owo/{field}

Notes : API routes are deprecated since several months, and are not returning any features that a customer could use, OVHcloud is now deleting those endpoints.
Customers that currently relies on the deprecated functions must stop their usage, otherwise, they will receive HTTP response with status code 404 Not Found after the deletion maintenance.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - Calling support is not working

Chat aren't fully stable.
Workaround : The Help Centre: https://help.ovhcloud.com remain accessible, you can create your tickets from there

We apologize for any inconveniences.
